tool_description: An API extracting all the latest global news articles, insights and trends revolving ChatGPT.
name: ChatGPT Related News
title: ChatGPT Related News

api_list.name: Get Individual News Source News
api_list.description:
Discover the latest news, insights, and trends about ChatGPT from a variety of trusted news sources. The API endpoint allows you to access ChatGPT-related news articles from the following reputable websites:

- TechCrunch
- The Guardian
- Wired
- The Verge
- The New York Times
- The Economist
- MIT Technology Review
- Indian Express
- BA Times
- Vox
- Suddeutsche Zeitung
- Le Figaro

Simply provide the specific newspaper ID associated with your desired news source (e.g., "LeFigaro" for Le Figaro) to retrieve all ChatGPT-related news articles published by that particular company. Stay informed and up-to-date with the latest developments in the world of ChatGPT.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://chatgpt-related-news.p.rapidapi.com/news/Guardian"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "chatgpt-related-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://chatgpt-related-news.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "chatgpt-related-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get all ChatGPT related news
api_list.description: This endpoint will provide you with all news, insights and trends about ChatGPT from around the world.
